data.title: Poke and Sons Order your tasty Bowls and Buns now!
data.meta_description: Poke & Sons in Copenhagen, offers a menu rich in Bowls, Buns and Gyozas, incl. vegan dishes - The restaurants features Danish design & taste
data.text:
Our love at Poke & Sons is all about delicious tasty Bowls & Buns served with a good conscience in restaurants based on danish design and filled with happy friendly people from around the world. Take a bite!

Join our customer club and be notified when we open new locations, when we have discounts or when we update our menu.

The sharing of tasty Bao Buns, yummie .. or tasting our mushi Gyozas – your choice. But remember, if you order a crisp Poke Bowl, add a tasty dip to embrace the umami even more.

Our new Poke & Sons restaurant is opening soon at the rooftop of Illum in Købmagergade 20, 1150 København. Serving delicious tasty Bowls & Buns.

We look so much forward inviting you to our new place.
